mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.develop_org AS "developOrg", a.develop_contact AS "developContact", a.develop_phone AS "developPhone", a.construction_org AS "constructionOrg", a.construction_contact AS "constructionContact", a.construction_phone AS "constructionPhone", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.project_address AS "projectAddress", a.site_situation AS "siteSituation", a.site_picture AS "sitePicture", a.site_check_result AS "siteCheckResult", a.checker AS "checker", a.check_date AS "checkDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tsiterecord a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.develop_org like '%'||#{developOrg}||'%' '%'+#{developOrg}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{developOrg}, '%')
AND a.construction_org like '%'||#{constructionOrg}||'%' '%'+#{constructionOrg}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{constructionOrg}, '%')
AND a.project_name like '%'||#{projectName}||'%' '%'+#{projectName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{projectName}, '%')
AND a.project_address like '%'||#{projectAddress}||'%' '%'+#{projectAddress}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{projectAddress}, '%')
AND a.checker like '%'||#{checker}||'%' '%'+#{checker}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{checker}, '%')
AND a.check_date >= To_Date('#{beginDate}','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') and a.check_date <= To_Date('#{endDate}','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
AND a.check_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate},'%Y-%m-%d %T') and a.check_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tsiterecord( develop_org, develop_contact, develop_phone, construction_org, construction_contact, construction_phone, project_name, project_address, site_situation, site_picture, site_check_result, checker, check_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{developOrg}, #{developContact}, #{developPhone}, #{constructionOrg}, #{constructionContact}, #{constructionPhone}, #{projectName}, #{projectAddress}, #{siteSituation}, #{sitePicture}, #{siteCheckResult}, #{checker}, #{checkDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tsiterecord SET develop_org = #{developOrg}, develop_contact = #{developContact}, develop_phone = #{developPhone}, construction_org = #{constructionOrg}, construction_contact = #{constructionContact}, construction_phone = #{constructionPhone}, project_name = #{projectName}, project_address = #{projectAddress}, site_situation = #{siteSituation}, site_picture = #{sitePicture}, site_check_result = #{siteCheckResult}, checker = #{checker}, check_date = #{checkDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
